title: Azure Blob Store: rclone confused by folder blobs
body: #### What is the problem you are having with rclone? `rclone` sees two folders for `adventure-works` in the following Azure blob store (see image). The Azure blob stores I use are littered with these "Hot" blobs. `rclone` invariably copies the file-looking one (even though Azure says it's a "folder"), and not the folder and its contents. #### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`) Tested with the following versions: ``` rclone v1.44 - os/arch: darwin/amd64 - go version: go1.11.1 ``` ``` rclone v1.45-011-gba8aa73a-fix-2654-azureblob-client-beta - os/arch: darwin/amd64 - go version: go1.11.2 ``` ``` rclone v1.44 - os/arch: linux/amd64 - go version: go1.11.1 ``` #### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit) Mac OS 64-bit Ubuntu 14.04 (trusty) 64-bit #### Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive) S3, Azure #### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`) `rclone sync azureremote:blob s3:bucket` `rclone sync azureremote:blob .` #### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`) Note the "Duplicate directory" notices in the log. ``` 2018/11/30 12:46:03 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.45-011-gba8aa73a-fix-2654-azureblob-client-beta" starting with parameters ["../rclone" "sync" "-vv" "airlift453:class-453" "."] 2018/11/30 12:46:03 DEBUG : Using config file from "/Users/bmc/.config/rclone/rclone.conf" 2018/11/30 12:46:03 DEBUG : pacer: Reducing sleep to 0s 2018/11/30 12:46:03 NOTICE: adventure-works: Duplicate directory found in source - ignoring 2018/11/30 12:46:03 NOTICE: airbnb/listings: Duplicate directory found in source - ignoring 2018/11/30 12:46:04 INFO : adventure-works: Copied (new) 2018/11/30 12:46:04 INFO : Local file system at /Users/bmc/tmp/rclone-v1.45-011-gba8aa73a-fix-2654-azureblob-client-beta-osx-amd64/tmp: Waiting for checks to finish 2018/11/30 12:46:04 INFO : Local file system at /Users/bmc/tmp/rclone-v1.45-011-gba8aa73a-fix-2654-azureblob-client-beta-osx-amd64/tmp: Waiting for transfers to finish 2018/11/30 12:46:04 INFO : airbnb/listings: Copied (new) 2018/11/30 12:46:04 INFO : PartnerOrderClean.json: Copied (new) 2018/11/30 12:47:03 INFO : Transferred: 200.189M / 273.261 MBytes, 73%, 3.335 MBytes/s, ETA 21s Errors: 0 Checks: 0 / 0, - Transferred: 3 / 4, 75% Elapsed time: 1m0s Transferring: * _$azuretmpfolder$/cdâ€¦-oct-06-detailed.csv: 73% /273.068M, 3.406M/s, 21s 2018/11/30 12:47:25 INFO : _$azuretmpfolder$/cd8e991f-21fd-489c-8205-b3c8fe717e64london-2018-oct-06-detailed.csv: Copied (new) 2018/11/30 12:47:25 INFO : Waiting for deletions to finish 2018/11/30 12:47:25 INFO : Transferred: 273.261M / 273.261 MBytes, 100%, 3.349 MBytes/s, ETA 0s Errors: 0 Checks: 0 / 0, - Transferred: 4 / 4, 100% Elapsed time: 1m21.5s 2018/11/30 12:47:25 DEBUG : 5 go routines active 2018/11/30 12:47:25 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.45-011-gba8aa73a-fix-2654-azureblob-client-beta" finishing with parameters ["../rclone" "sync" "-vv" "airlift453:class-453" "."] ```
